name: Garden (oliea)
description:
For you to survive throughout the levels you need to collect coins, these coin are dropped from honorific monsters which they are spawned within the area.

meet the enemies.

Beware these deadly monsters are fast!

Don't get to close he bites!

FEATURES:Collect 1000 coins

  • 5 Levels
  • survive throughout the level without dying

MINMUM:

  • Windows 7, 8, or 10
  • Memory: 4 RAM
  • Storage :  5MB available space
